quest.name: Reach for the Stars
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Loymet is furrowing her brow.
objectives: Use the corrosive elixir on the spotted spiders, then defeat the doom of the Everlasting Dark.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: Thank goodness you are here. I would ask for your help with a rather urgent matter.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: In recent days, trespassers we believe to be of the Children of the Everlasting Dark have been spotted near the Morning Stars.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: No doubt come for the secrets of our temples.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: By all rights they should have been stopped before even reaching Yx'Maja, but fending off the Eulmorans has spread our patrols thin.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: They cannot be suffered to remain here any longer.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: Will you help us find them?

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: When last spotted, they were accompanied by giant spiders. They are monstrous creatures with skin like armor. Use this elixir to cut through their defenses. Go swiftly, and may the blessings of the wood be upon you.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: We believe they are in hiding near the Morning Stars. If you should find them, do not forget the elixir.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: You have routed the trespassers, I take it.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: They seemed fixated on the temples of the Morning Stars, perhaps drawn by the radiant stones atop them.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: To an outsider they might appear a source of power, but that is quite far from the truth.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: They glow with the power of these woods, of Ronka. The light would fade the moment they were moved.

dialogue.name: LOYMET
dialogue.text: But regardless of their worth, such crimes cannot be tolerated. I will see to it we strengthen our defenses of the border. This will not happen again.
